title: Banning Toxic players for telling other to kill themselves.
body:
Lately i have noticed the toxicity of league to be dropping substantially and that is great news! unfortunately however, no matter how nice and well mannered i try to be there is always one person in at least 1 out of 10 games that seems to be so toxic that i almost think they are singed, cass, teemo AND twitch all rolled into one in real life. 

On a more serious note however some of these players will tell people in the game to kill themselves (i have photographic proof of such events occuring multiple times), or neck themselves, or something along those lines. Personally i find it to be one of the lowest forms of cyber bullying. and as such, would like to see Riot take some more drastic forms of punishment with these people. On the OCE especially it almost seems like there is STILL no tribunal and that toxic players can and always do get away with things scott free and with no repercussions. this is unfortunate and very sad to see as the big consensus amongst toxic players is "go ahead and report me, there's no tribunal anyway" and then they go straight back to being terrible people to the team. 
it's all well and fine to say "just don' let it get to you" or "Don't play if you can't handle it" but then you're saying that you basically can't be bothered stopping them or that you're not willing to do anything to stop them. then where does that leave us? 
I just want to see the game be a better place for those people that have the biggest hearts like Braum and care for others instead of seeing them pushed away because no one decided to do anything about toxic players. so please riot, im not asking you to go out of your way and monitor every single game. all i am asking for is a more active hand in the way things are run, especially on the OCE, and to try and make sure things like people telling other people to kill themselves don't go unpunished. thank you for your time and i look forward to continuing to see great summoners on the fields of justice!

             OutrageousSage

It proves what kind of person they are when they say that.. Really disgusts me that people can be so stupid and wish these things on someone who's done nothing wrong.

The tribunal isn't currently active, it isn't on any region atm because it's undergoing maintenance (whatever that means), no ETA on reactivation. BUT the ban system is still working. If you have screenshots, my recommendation, send in a support ticket and attach the images, they may or may not take a look but it's your best bet atm to get them looked at outside of reporting them.

I was told it is coming in the 'close future' 2 years ago. 

It's too late anyway, I see people saying worse things daily, you send a screenshot to riot plus report button and nothing ever happens.
